channel.title: Lifestyle on Deniz
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Deniz

item.title: My favorite place on Earth
item.description: Today, I want to talk a little it about my favorite place on Earth: Columbus, Ohio At this beautiful place you can visit: COSI, Columbus Museum of Art, Short North Arts District, and Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Gardens “Columbus is a town in which almost anything is likely to happen, and in which almost everything has.” — James Thurber ##Fun Fact## Did you know that Thomas Edison was born in Milan, Ohio?

item.title: Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance
item.description: Exploring the relationship between weight and physical activity Load the data data(yrbss) glimpse(yrbss) ## Rows: 13,583 ## Columns: 13 ## $ age <int> 14, 14, 15, 15, 15, 15, 15, 14, 15, 15, 15, … ## $ gender <chr> "female", "female", "female", "female", "fem… ## $ grade <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9", "9", "9", "9", "9", "9",… ## $ hispanic <chr> "not", "not", "hispanic", "not", "not", "not… ## $ race <chr> "Black or African American", "Black or Afric… ## $ height <dbl> NA, NA, 1.

item.title: Differences between directors
item.description: Tim Burton vs Steven Spielberg movies <- read_csv(here::here("data", "movies.csv")) glimpse(movies) ## Rows: 2,961 ## Columns: 11 ## $ title <chr> "Avatar", "Titanic", "Jurassic World", "The Aveng… ## $ genre <chr> "Action", "Drama", "Action", "Action", "Action", … ## $ director <chr> "James Cameron", "James Cameron", "Colin Trevorro… ## $ year <dbl> 2009, 1997, 2015, 2012, 2008, 1999, 1977, 2015, 2… ## $ duration <dbl> 178, 194, 124, 173, 152, 136, 125, 141, 164, 93, … ## $ gross <dbl> 7.

item.title: Deniz Gokmen
item.description: First of all, thank you for reading this far. My name is Deniz Gokmen. I was born in Istanbul, Turkey but I spent a majority of my childhood in Ankara,Turkey. I moved to United States to complete my bachelor degree. I majored in Finance and minored in Economics at the Ohio State University. After living 5 years at the US, I decided to pursue my graduate education in London, United Kingdom.

item.title: Deniz Gokmen
item.description: First of all, thank you for reading this far. My name is Deniz Gokmen. I was born in Istanbul, Turkey but I spent a majority of my childhood in Ankara,Turkey. I moved to United States to complete my bachelor degree. I majored in Finance and minored in Economics at the Ohio State University. After living 5 years at the US, I decided to pursue my graduate education in London, United Kingdom.
